Uses of Interface
fr.upmc.components.ComponentI

  • Packages that use ComponentI 
    Package Description
    fr.upmc.components
    Basic component model.
    fr.upmc.components.cvm
    Component virtual machines for both single computer and distributed deployments.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.basic_cs.components  
    fr.upmc.components.examples.basic_cs.ports  
    fr.upmc.components.examples.ddeployment_cs.components
    Components for the dynamic client/server example The dynamic client/server example uses three components: DynamicURIConsumer is the dynamic version of the component URIConsumer of the basic client/server example.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.ddeployment_cs.ports  
    fr.upmc.components.examples.reflection.components  
    fr.upmc.components.examples.reflection.ports  
    fr.upmc.components.ports
    Hierarchy of ports to expose interfaces of components and interconnect them.
    fr.upmc.components.pre.dcc
    Dynamic remote component creation and connection for component assemblies.
    fr.upmc.components.pre.dcc.ports  
    fr.upmc.components.reflection.ports  

    • Uses of ComponentI in fr.upmc.components

      Classes in fr.upmc.components that implement ComponentI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractComponent
      The class AbstractComponent represents the basic information and methods for components in the component model.
      protected static class  AbstractPlugin.Fake
      The static class Fake implements a fake component used to call the services of the component on which the plug-in is to be installed or uninstalled.
      Fields in fr.upmc.components declared as ComponentI 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ComponentI AbstractPlugin.owner
      component holding this plug-in
      Fields in fr.upmc.components with type parameters of type ComponentI 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.Vector<ComponentI> AbstractComponent.innerComponents
      inner components owned by this component.
      Methods in fr.upmc.components with parameters of type ComponentI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AbstractPlugin.installOn(ComponentI owner) 
      void PluginI.installOn(ComponentI owner)
      initialise the plug-in reference to its owner component and add to the component every specific information, ports, etc. required to run the plug-in; subclasses should add any other initialisation necessary to make the plug-in work in the context of its owner.

    • Uses of ComponentI in fr.upmc.components.examples.basic_cs.components

      Classes in fr.upmc.components.examples.basic_cs.components that implement ComponentI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  URIConsumer
      The class URIConsumer implements a component that gets URI from a URI provider component.
      class  URIProvider
      The class URIProvider implements a component that provides URI creation services.

    • Uses of ComponentI in fr.upmc.components.examples.basic_cs.ports

      URIConsumerOutboundPort(java.lang.String uri, ComponentI owner)
      create the port with the given URI and the given owner.
      URIProviderInboundPort(java.lang.String uri, ComponentI owner)
      create the port under some given URI and for a given owner.

    • Uses of ComponentI in fr.upmc.components.examples.ddeployment_cs.components

      Classes in fr.upmc.components.examples.ddeployment_cs.components that implement ComponentI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DynamicAssembler
      The class DynamicAssembler implements a component that creates the other components of the dynamic deployment example, makes them interconnect, and starts them.
      class  DynamicURIConsumer
      The class DynamicURIConsumer is the dynamically deployed version of the component URIConsumer of the basic client/server example.

    • Uses of ComponentI in fr.upmc.components.examples.reflection.components

      Classes in fr.upmc.components.examples.reflection.components that implement ComponentI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ReflectionClient
      The class ReflectionClient defines the component that exhibits the active behaviour in the example, calling the server component reflectively to get information and change its service implementation.
      class  ReflectionServer
      The class ReflectionServer defines the component which is the target of the example reflective processing.

    • Uses of ComponentI in fr.upmc.components.pre.dcc

      Classes in fr.upmc.components.pre.dcc that implement ComponentI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DynamicComponentCreator
      The class DynamicComponentCreator defines components that will be automatically added in each of the sites of a distributed component assembly to allow for the dynamic remote creation of components on the virtual where the component is running.
